Class AppController

java.lang.Object
aeroporto.aeroportopackage.controller.AppController
public final class AppController extends Object
The type App controller. Defines the controller that manages the entire application.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AppController getInstance()
      Gets instance of the controller, the keyword synchronized is used to prevent strange things happening when two users try to do the same thing at the same time.
      Returns:
      the instance

    • setMainFrame

      public void setMainFrame(MainFrame mainFrame)
      Sets main frame of the gui.
      Parameters:
      mainFrame - the main frame

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password)
      Login boolean. This is the function that manages the login of a user. It works as an "interface" since the major work is done by the functions it calls.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • generateNumeroBiglietto

      public String generateNumeroBiglietto(String codiceVolo)
      Generate numero biglietto string. This function generates a valid and mostly unique code for a ticket. If it somehow refers to an unknow flight, it sets the "codiceVolo" to SCONOSCIUTO, then generates a pseudo-randomic number and adds that to the "TKT" string, as well as the flight number.
      Parameters:
      codiceVolo - the codice volo
      Returns:
      the string

    • extractCodiceVoloFromNumeroBiglietto

      public static String extractCodiceVoloFromNumeroBiglietto(String numeroBiglietto)
      Extract codice volo from numero biglietto string.
      Parameters:
      numeroBiglietto - the numero biglietto
      Returns:
      the string
